MANGA.TOKYO > About MANGA.TOKYO                           About MANGA.TOKYO                            Company name Gradus inc. CEO Tetsuya Okamura Established 2015 Address MinamisembaSOHO Bld.702, 4-10-5, Minamisemba, Chuo-ku Osaka-shi, Osaka, 542-0081, Japan https://gradus.jp/en/ MANGA.TOKYO is Your Otaku Friend in Japan MANGA.TOKYO is an online news site that is dedicated to bringing you the fastest and most interesting news related to anime, manga, games, and other aspects of Japanese otaku culture. We also bring you:  reports on otaku events and concerts reviews of the latest anime anime travel reports articles that introduce various aspects of otaku culture and more!  We accept Press Releases in both Japanese and English, so do not hesitate to contact us if you would like to add us to your Press Release list. We also translate and publish articles with cooperation from news websites Comic Natalie and AnimeAnime, as well as pop culture website KAI-YOU. As we are based in Japan with Japanese otaku staff, this is as close you can get to Japanese otaku culture without stepping a foot in Japan! We also have staff and writers from all corners of the Earth. If you have any questions or would like to give us feedback, then we’d love to hear from you via the form below.
